newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bonn tops up 5-yr, 10-yr bonds by 1 bln dmk,
newsitem.headline: Bonn tops up 5-yr, 10-yr bonds by 1 bln dmk,

text.p: The German federal government will top up the issue volume of its 6.25 percent, 10-year bond by one billion marks to 14 billion marks, the Bundesbank as issuing agent said on Friday.
The government is also topping up the volume of its 5.25 percent Series 118 five-year bonds, or Bobls, by one billion marks to 10 billion, the Bundesbank said.
The Bundesbank said it would place the additional tranches via the stock exchange from August 27 as part of its market-smoothing operations.
